name: Easy Sausage Biscuit Bites
author: Paula
summary: This is an easy appetizer to serve at any gathering. I like to put a dot of sweet hot mustard on each bite after they are cooked, but it might be better to just offer the extra mustard for those who want it. Place a toothpick in each bite to serve.
ingredients: 1 (12 ounce) can refrigerated biscuit dough (such as Pillsbury Grands Jr.®)
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Spread each biscuit into a 2x4-inch oval using your hands
Brush hot mustard onto each biscuit
Place a sausage link across the short edge of each biscuit oval and roll up lengthwise
Cut each rolled biscuit into 4 round slices
Bake in the preheated oven until biscuits are browned, 18 to 20 minutes
